mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.org_code AS orgCode,t.company_name AS companyName,t.ipo_plate AS ipoPlate,t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc FROM ipo_case t,case_common_status_info t1 where ipo_plate = '069001001006' AND t.id = t1.case_id and t1.release_flag = '1' ORDER BY RAND() limit 4;

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM ipo_h5 m)AS ipoCompanyCount, (SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM sa_company m WHERE m.belongs_plate = '02' AND m.ipo_flag = '1' AND m.liststate = '0') AS saCompanyCount, t.id AS id, t.bid AS bid, t.research AS research, t.research_ranking AS researchRanking, t.patent AS patent, (select sum(m.patent)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentAll, t.patent_new AS patentNew, (select sum(m.patent_new)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentNewAll, t.patent_design AS patentDesign, (select sum(m.patent_design)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentDesignAll, t.patent_internation AS patentInternation, (select sum(m.patent_internation)from ipo_h5 m)AS patentInternationAll, (ifnull(t.patent,0)+ifnull(t.patent_new,0)+ifnull(t.patent_design,0)+ifnull(t.patent_internation,0)) AS patentSum, (select sum(mt.patentSum) from (select (ifnull(m.patent,0)+ifnull(m.patent_new,0)+ifnull(m.patent_design,0)+ifnull(m.patent_internation,0)) AS patentSum from ipo_h5 m) as mt)AS patentSumAll, t.patent_ranking AS patentRanking, t.patent_ranking_year AS patentRankingYear, t.research_peo AS researchPeo, t.research_peo_core AS researchPeoCore, t.company_peo AS companyPeo, t.research_peo_ranking AS researchPeoRanking, t.research_peo_year AS researchPeoYear, t.taking AS taking, t.taking_ranking AS takingRanking, t.taking_ranking_gem AS takingRankingGem, t.taking_ranking_year AS takingRankingYear, t.profits AS profits, t.profits_ranking AS profitsRanking, t.profits_ranking_gem AS profitsRankingGem, t.profits_ranking_year AS profitsRankingYear, t.assets AS assets, t.assets_ranking AS assetsRanking, t.assets_ranking_gem AS assetsRankingGem, t.assets_ranking_year AS assetsRankingYear, t.research_year AS researchYear, t.research_plate_fiavg AS researchPlateFiavg, t.research_plate_seavg AS researchPlateSeavg, t.research_plate_thavg AS researchPlateThavg, t.taking_fiavg AS takingFiavg, t.taking_seavg AS takingSeavg, t.taking_thavg AS takingThavg, t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc, t.research_year_se AS researchYearSe, t.research_year_th AS researchYearTh FROM ipo_h5 t WHERE t.bid = #{bid}
SELECT t.industry_csrc AS industryCsrc FROM ipo_case t WHERE t.id = #{bid}

SELECT (SELECT SUM(1) FROM ipo_case t WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ipo_intermediary_org m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.org_code = #{orgCode} AND m.intermediary_type = #{intermediaryType})) AS businessVolume, (SELECT SUM(1) FROM ipo_case t WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ipo_intermediary_org m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.org_code = #{orgCode} AND m.intermediary_type = #{intermediaryType}) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ipo_process m WHERE m.bid = t.id AND m.process_type_code = '35' AND m.iec_result = '05')) AS passing
